name: Improved Devastating Strike

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Devastating Strike, Vital Strike, base attack bonus +13.

sections.body: Whenever you use Vital Strike, Improved Vital Strike, or Greater Vital Strike, you gain a bonus on attack rolls to confirm a critical hit equal to the bonus on damage rolls you gain from Devastating Strike.
sections.name: Benefits

description: The fury and power channeled through your attack is enough to kill a lesser being outright.
